description: Be Mammut – every day: For hiking, climbing or everyday wear. The Core T-Shirt from the Logowear collection shows your passion for the outdoors no matter where you’re going. The fabric is comfortable, soft and lightweight. It also wicks moisture away from the skin quickly and dries quickly. An essential part of your wardrobe that matches well with almost anything.
name: Mammut Mammut Core T-Shirt Snow - Mens
